Headline: #55N 55th/Narragansett Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Narragansett/63rd Place
ShortDescription: EB #55N 55th/Narragansett buses are temp rerouted via Narragansett, 65th, Austin, 63rd and Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/63rd Place.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #55N 55th/Narragansett buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, 65th, Austin, 63rd and Narragansett, then resume their normal route,  due to street blockage near Narragansett/63rd Place.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Sheridan
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Sheridan due to a door problem on a train.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#151 Sheridan

#36 Broadway

#84 Peterson

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
